description: Sum of exponents in prime-power factorization of C(4n,n).
comments: Also sum of exponents of primes in multinomial coefficient M(4n; n,n,n,n)/M(3n; n,n,n).
maple: with(numtheory):a:=proc(n) if n=0 then 0 else bigomega(binomial(4*n,n)) fi end: seq(a(n), n=1..78); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 11 2008
author: _Clark Kimberling_
